reviewText: Rip Off, New Name Same Movie ... Just Cashing in On the Bad Santa Films, This Movie Originally Released on Dvd & Titled "Santa's Slay", It's a Great Movie & Very Very Funny & So if You Don't Already Have It, By All Means Get It ... It's a Great Christmas Comedy Movie But if Your Looking for a New Movie or Something in the Bad Santa Series You'll Be Sorely Mistaken, lol :)
